text: <!group> So sorry to do this again but I have another unschuled vet visit this AM (:white_frowning_face:). Will rush to the office afterwards and I’m hoping to be there by standup.
good luck, sir.
no need to apologize
On my way there but won't make it in time. My updates are: 1. Will work with Joel on Debian Packages, 2. Going to start setting things up for the settings page until designs are ready

since I’m in a BrandLab planning meeting:
* work with Gaston to get packaging finalized
* get temp sensor code merged into current gateway image
* finish testing power management on the cap
questions I have: 1. Can we find out from Shashi (<@U04JZANJF>) when we’ll have the 5 starflats delivered to us?
2. can we have <@U02F8LF2X> print out a reference cap that would house the starflats and the LED top? I am curious how it will look / fit atop a bottle
3. <@U04JZANJF> <@U02E3CRMA>: Wondering if we can queue up some HW work for Lee this week before Adidas / LittleBits takes him away from us
4. I am working on revising the pitch deck from yesterday (notes have been added, now just need to address them)
5. <@U02618EV1> can we get the site copy updated?
update from me - got the design for the settings page p much done
<@U02E3CRMA>, if you have some time today, it’d be great if i can show you what i got. have a question or two about some stuff.
<@U026NB2U2>: regarding #3, I’d like to get Lee working on a fallback implementation using the Nordic nRF52 chip
dev kit will be here Thurs, and we can reuse those learnings for LittleBits
<@U02AUNA0P>: looking forward to seeing it. I’ll come find you this afternoon.
k. can we discuss that jump from Intel to non-Intel?
sure thing
<@U026NB2U2> Absolutely on #5. Should be up in a few.
Ok, it’s up now. Phillip, when you get a chance can you take a look? The intro copy is now three lines and wanted to make sure it looks good (type/spacing wise) from your end.
<@U02AUNA0P>: ^^
